title: White House Delays Obamacare Subsidy Suit (Audio)
itunes:title: White House Delays Obamacare Subsidy Suit (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Kristen Underhill, a professor at Columbia Law School, and Josh Blackman, a professor at South Texas College of Law, discuss why the Trump administration is trying to delay a lawsuit involving affordable care act subsidies. They speak with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
